org.drip.state.curve

Class BasisSplineMarketSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.definition.MarketSurface
      • org.drip.state.curve.BasisSplineMarketSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.drip.analytics.definition.Curve, org.drip.state.representation.LatentState

    public class BasisSplineMarketSurface
extends org.drip.analytics.definition.MarketSurface
    BasisSplineMarketSurface implements the Market surface that holds the latent state's Dynamics parameters.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
